Profile Dependencies Plugin

Dependency management from profiles (.m2/settings.xml).

With generic EAR or WAR, allow to inject some context/profile dependencies, these one included in packaging, and so detected and usable are runtime by common/core code; e.g. : injecting struts 2 jar as dependency into WAR, so that actions and other things from jar would be accessible with deployed WAR.

Goals Overview

  • profiledep:inject Injects dependencies from activated profiles.
  • profiledep:inject-ear-module Injects EAR modules from activated profiles.

Usage

General instructions on how to use the Profile Dependencies Plugin can be found on the usage page.
